short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to make web more accessible for people with dyslexia

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Eureka, your personal assistant for smoother web reading experiences! Designed with individuals with dyslexia in mind, Eureka is a Chrome extension crafted to enhance readability and comprehension effortlessly.

Eureka offers a suite of features tailored to cater to diverse reading needs:

1. **Enhanced Readability:** With Eureka, say goodbye to struggling with complex web text. Our extension dynamically adjusts font styles, spacing, and background colors to optimize readability, ensuring every word is accessible and understandable.

2. **Text Simplification:** Harnessing the power of cutting-edge AI, Eureka simplifies text complexities on-the-fly. Whether you're browsing news articles, research papers, or educational content, our AI-driven text simplification feature rephrases sentences and reduces jargon, making even the most intricate information easily digestible.

3. **Customization Options:** Eureka puts you in control of your reading experience. Tailor the extension to your preferences with adjustable settings for font size, color themes, and text simplification levels. Personalize your browsing experience to suit your unique needs.

4. **Seamless Integration:** Eureka seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, providing instant accessibility whenever and wherever you're browsing the web. Whether you're reading articles, studying for exams, or researching online, Eureka is your trusty companion for smoother, more enjoyable reading sessions.

Empower yourself with Eureka and unlock a world of effortless web reading. Install the extension now and embark on a journey to enhanced readability and comprehension. Let Eureka be your guide to a more accessible online experience.
